string-array.name: tables
string-array.item: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS FORMS ( id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, program TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, form_name TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, p_id TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, form_date DATETIME, timestamp DATETIME NOT NULL, username TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS FORMS_VALUE ( id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, form_id INT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, field_name TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, value TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, FOREIGN KEY (form_id) REFERENCES FORMS(id) )
